question.title: How to center JLabel & JTextArea in a horizontal box?
question.body:
I have a Java Swing horizontal box that contains both a label and a JTextArea.

I am trying to center the label and text vertically within the box, but the text is showing up higher than the label.

I am trying to call " .setAlignmentY(Component.CENTER " on all three elements (box, label, text area), so I don't know why the label and text don't line up

How should I center the two vertically within their horizontal box?
